response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you for a special introductory price of $13,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a significant discount. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 13500}
